ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Setup.Automation_Settings__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c != true, Running_Credit_Decisioning__c != true, ISCHANGED(Status__c), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status__c), "Pending Decision"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Decisioned"), ISPICKVAL(Credit_Decision__c, "Approved"), OR( ISBLANK(Credit_Bureau_Score__c ), ISBLANK(TEXT(Risk_Grade__c)), ISBLANK(Risk_Grade_Source__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Unable to approve application with a blank Credit Bureau Score, Risk Grade, or Risk Grade Source. Please check those fields and adjust as needed.
